Message.Title: New Message Boards are Awesome!
Message.Msg: The old format was just horrible. The new one is so much cleaner. Marissa is the best thing to happen to Yahoo, will be a nice to watch her give her previous employer some real competition. She is sure going to have a lot of fun doing it. Go BOD, Go Marissa!
REPORT spam. This is YOUR community. Don't expect Yahoo to clean up YOUR MESS. Algorithm works if ENOUGH PEOPLE REPORT, the boards will be different.

Message.Title: Why you pay $3.70 to $4 for gas?
Message.Msg: Obama blocked the Keystone pipeline and cancelled offshore oil drilling. Americans pay close to $4 a gallon for gasoline. Canada ready to do business with China in a $15 billion oil deal. Source - foxnews This would have created tens of thousands of American jobs. Obama's incompetence hurts the poor and middle class, not the rich. The rich already have accumulated their fortunes and don't need jobs to make a living like we do and $4 gas means nothing to them.

Message.Title: Be Relevant to 700M users + ADD $2 to $5 BILLION to Yahoo Net Income
Message.Msg: Marissa and LOEB Use Cost Co and WalMart model of group buying to save your members $$ on : 1- Auto insurance 2- Banking- Free checking and Bill Pay 3- Cell phone services 4- Computers and software services Coop (Unite small business servie providers=USBSP) 5- Tax Prep Coop (USBSP) 6- Vacation and travel services Coop (USBSP) 7- Medical and life insurance Coop (USRSP) 8- Mortgages This will cover each consumer's housing AND non-housing regular monthly and annual expenses we all spend !!! Make 2% on $100 Bil NET + advertising of these Coop service members. = $3 to $5 Billion net income BOOST. ONE STOP SHOPPING AND SAVINGS FOR OUR REGULAR EXPENSES. We save 5% to 15% on our current bills (not new bills)= LOYALTY NS REPEAT DOING BUSINESS $$$ with Yahoo.

Message.Title: Yahoo! Inc Stock Buy Recommendation Reiterated
Message.Msg: Yahoo has been reiterated by TheStreet Ratings as a buy with a ratings score of B- . The company's strengths can be seen in multiple areas, such as its reasonable valuation levels, increase in stock price during the past year and expanding profit margins. We feel these strengths outweigh the fact that the company has had sub par growth in net income.

Message.Title: yahoo pls give us back old mb.
Message.Msg: new format not good. i will just stop using yahoo

Topic.Title: Yahoo! Inc Stock Buy Recommendation Reiterated

Message.Msg: Compared to where it was 12 months ago, the stock is up, but it has so far lagged the appreciation in the S&P 500. Turning our attention to the future direction of the stock, it goes without saying that even the best stocks can fall in an overall down market. However, in any other environment, this stock still has good upside potential despite the fact that it has already risen in the past year.

Message.Title: Yahoo to buy Sirius XM.
Message.Msg: It appears that Dan Loeb and John Malone are working on a deal where Yahoo will help fund Liberty Media's creeping takeover of Sirius XM, support Liberty's position with the FCC that it already has over 50% of the voting stock and should be allowed to take control, and then when Mel Karmazin is fired Liberty will trade its share of Sirius XM to Yahoo in exchange for part of Yahoo's stake in YahooJapan making it a effective tax free swap. Yahoo will then launch a tender offer for the rest of the outstanding shares of Sirius XM.

Message.Title: Being a CEO is not the same

If this a positive or negative to yahoo?

Just what Yahoo needs, another piece of useless crap. XM does not make enough money to pay Howard Stern the $100 million a year. Yes, I do subscribe to XM but not at the price they want to charge. Each year, it goes up a bit. I call them and tell them to cancel my account. They then lower the bill to where it was. If everyone did that, they would be out of business.
